s.text: The doubter will be Bill Kristol, TV pundit and editor of the Weekly Standard . That makes Kristol, among more glorious attributes, Slate 's neighbor in a downtown D.C. office building--which may answer the question several distressed readers have asked: Why so many writers in Slate from the Weekly Standard ? Answer: They're just so ...
